# The `AntiDepBreaker` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class works in conjunction with the post-RA scheduler to rename registers to break register anti-dependencies (WAR hazards). <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::AntiDepBreaker</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class works in conjunction with the post-RA scheduler to rename registers to break register anti-dependencies (WAR hazards).

Definition at line 31 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/antidepbreaker-h">AntiDepBreaker.h</a>.
